1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Episode 101-Host Will Clinger finds an abundance of lactose-tolerance at CHEESE DAYS in Monroe, Wisconsin; treads very carefully at the world's largest RATTLESNAKE ROUNDUP in Sweetwater, Texas; investigates America's last remaining BARBER POLE FACTORY in St. Paul; learns the challenges of LIVING IN A 727 jetliner in Hillsboro, Oregon; samples some of the more than five thousand condiments at the NATIONAL MUSTARD MUSEUM; and visits the ultimate Roadside Attraction: ROCK-IN-THE-HOUSE (not to be confused with House on the Rock) in Fountain City, Wisconsin.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Episode 102 - In Las Vegas, host Will Clinger pays homage to the iconic signs of yesteryear at the NEON BONEYARD, and then witnesses a miracle cure at HANGOVER HEAVEN; proceeds to Los Angeles to sample the potions, hexes and voodoo dolls at FARMACIA BOTANICA; browses the rockets and sprockets at Sparta, Wisconsin's DEKE SLAYTON SPACE and BICYCLE MUSEUM, then joins the revved up crowd at America's largest ART CAR PARADE in Houston.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Episode 103 - Host Will Clinger stares in amazement at the largest airplane ever built - Howard Hughes' "SPRUCE GOOSE" on display in McMinnville, Oregon's Evergreen Air and Space Museum; witnesses some strange things indeed at Portland's PECULIARIUM; marvels at Marv's incredible collection of FARM TOYS in Wisconsin; admires the aluminum siding at Houston's BEER CAN HOUSE and then pulls over for gas station memorabilia at CLASSICAL in Embudo, New Mexico. Fill 'er up.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Episode 104 - Host Will Clinger returns to Sin City to play classic machines at Las Vegas' PINBALL HALL of FAME and gets an explosive tour of the NATIONAL ATOMIC TESTING MUSEUM, watches a PARADE THAT DOESN'T MOVE AN INCH in Whalan, Minnesota; goes souvenir hunting at the LOS ANGELES CORONER'S GIFT SHOP; then follows his nose to BAUMGARTNER'S CHEESE SHOP in Monroe, Wisconsin for Limburger sandwiches and finds out why all that cash is stashed on the ceiling.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Episode 105 - Host Will Clinger offers his condolences at Houston's MUSEUM of FUNERAL CUSTOMS; celebrates the weird and wonderful world of sculptor DR. EVERMOR near Baraboo, Wisconsin; craves the collection of HALF-EATEN CELEBRITY SANDWICHES in the Land of Lincoln; discovers who ED was and why Wykoff, Minnesota gave him his own museum; and drops in on a Portland, Oregon donut shop to play witness at a VOODOO WEDDING.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Episode 106 - Host Will Clinger looks on with envy at the WORLD BEARD and MOUSTACHE CHAMPIONSHIP in Portland, then quenches his thirst at nearby BELMONT STATION beer store boasting some bizarre brews; unearths the LOST EGYPTIAN CITY from Cecil B. DeMille's classic "Ten Commandments" beneath the sand dunes on the California coast; visits the ELEPHANT SEALS for their siesta in San Simeon, and explores a lively Los Angeles MUSEUM DEVOTED SOLELY TO DEATH.
